titles.title: MP773 With harps and with viols

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
With harps and with viols
there stands a great throng
in the presence of Jesus,
and sing this new song:

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
All these once were sinners,
defiled in His sight,
now arrayed in pure garments
in praise they unite;
Refrain

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He's made of the rebel
a priest and a king,
He has bought us, and taught us
this new song to sing:
Refrain

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
How helpless and hopeless
we sinners had been,
if He never had loved us
till cleansed from our sin!
Refrain

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Aloud in His praises
our voices shall ring,
so that others, believing,
this new song shall sing:
Refrain

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Unto Him who has loved us
and washed us from sin,
unto Him be the glory
for ever! Amen.
